metadata.description: Provides current weather conditions and forecasts via the Model Context Protocol

enrich-with-weather.description: Pull in real-time weather context to augment RAG answers.

messages.content:
You are assisting with retrieval-augmented generation for the rag-workshop demo.
Use the Weather MCP server to gather current conditions that match the user question. Summarise the weather data in 2-3 sentences and explain how it is relevant to the query before handing back to the main agent.
